H3.text: who did kim richards marry. Greg Davis

A4.text: In 1985, Richards married Monty Brinson, a supermarket-franchise heir who later became a professional poker player.

A5.text: Later that year, she married Gregg Davis, the son of petroleum mogul Marvin Davis and his wife Barbara Davis.
